pages.text: Broad and huge, Mastiffs were originally bred for various sports such as hunting, war, and guarding.$(br2)Standing at over a black tall, these massive dogs come in two coats.
These dogs can most commonly be found in plains and windswept savannas. They can also be found in other windswept biomes, and more rarely in dark forests.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Beef Treat.
